name: .ASTRO
summary: Learn about .ASTRO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open ASTRO files with source code or text editor. Some source code editor options include Microsoft Visual Studio Code (multiplatform), Sublime Text (multiplatform), and Brackets (Windows and macOS). These editors are helpful because they provide features, such as syntax highlighting.

Plain text editors, such as Microsoft Notepad (Windows) or Apple TextEdit (macOS), can also open ASTRO files. However, these options don't provide the same helpful viewing and editing capabilities as source code editors.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .astro file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.9
images.caption: ASTRO file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.9
